__e: It is great pleasure for me... to see you at this place.
So, I've done what you all asked and waited two years, but now that I am 25, and free to decide for myself whom I will marry, it is with great pleasure...
I know that my being offered this post would have given him enormous pleasure.
And that I'm dying... for something big... and beautiful... and greater than me.
Well, you know, I feel like I've sort of run my course here, and you know, besides, there's a all big world out there, and it's time I saw it.
This place is huge. I'm never home.
